DOC.brief_summary: The study of safety of Isophosphoramide Mustard (IPM) in the treatment of advanced cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Protocol for the Safety and Tolerance of Intravenous Isophosphoramide Mustard (IPM) in Patients With Advanced Cancer
DOC.criteria: Metastatic and /or unresectable disease state after previous standard chemotherapy
